title: OPL Brisbane event!
body:
Hey everyone,

Hope you guys got time to check out the OPL final in Brisbane. Was really great meeting some local players and having a chat.

For those of you that couldn't make it on the day live here's a Vlog from one of our amazing cosplayers - https://www.facebook.com/pikapiart/

https://youtu.be/cc0bh-OuuC0

Here are also some pictures of the event I took (I'm sure there are lots of pics out there already though =D)

https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.649610818529336.1073741829.546307902192962&type=3

replies.body: When is OPL planning to be hosted in Brisbane again?

That was the split 2 OPL grand finals, there are only one of those each year. (They lead into World Championship qualifiers)

Last year we had it in Luna Park Sydney, This year was Brisbane. I'm not sure what the current plans are but I would say it's unlikely to be in Brisbane next year.

Never fret though where ever it is held we will always support local viewing parties that pop up for our esports events.
My friend already has infernal Diana, so what can she do with the skin code?
if she does use it i think it gives a mys skin just for completeness
